name: Up Until Now
description:
This is a visual experience that revolves around me (Nick) and my memories. It's a game but also not a game. the only mechanic in the experience is keep moving otherwise memories fade and you will be left in darkness. There are many bad memories in this game but the overall message is that life goes on as long as you keep on moving.

Hold 'Right key' to move - or don't

Song : Betamaxx - Only In Movies

Postmortem
